channel.title: Social Phone Blogs Server War Insane Chris Birthday Humor on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Social Phone Blogs Server War Insane Chris Birthday Humor on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: one of my most hated things
item.description: is when you lose a blog entry mid creation. ohhhhh. I hate that a lot. I had written about my night here on bald mountain and how it was a lot of fun and crazy. but now I am not interested in rewriting my entry. sad day. so here is the summary: work dumb went to bar with matt bonded with matt morgan invited us to hang out at watusi was insane went to watusi craziness got weird scratch on face from wrestling drank too many beers went to morgans forgot sweatshirt more insanity work up hate blogs.
